Class Shop

java.lang.Object
Shop
public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
Stores objects for the supplier list, inventory, and order repository.

Since:
2019-10-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ryan Lisowski (ID: 00257796)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Shop​(SupplierList supplierList, Inventory inventory, OrderRepository orderRepository)
    A constructor for the Shop class, which acts as a container for other major portions of the application's functionality and in-memory data storage.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void advanceToNextDay()
    Calls the method to advance to the next (simulation) day in the order repository.
    java.time.LocalDate getCurrentDate()
    Gets the current (simulation) day from the order repository.
    Inventory getInventory()
    Gets an object holding the array list of tools.
    OrderRepository getOrderRepository()
    Gets the object holding the array list of daily orders.
    SupplierList getSupplierList()
    Gets an array list of tool suppliers.

    Calls the search tool by ID method in inventory.
    java.lang.String searchToolByName​(java.lang.String providedToolName)
    Calls the search tool by name method in inventory.

    Sets the object holding the array list of tools.

    Sets the object holding an array list of daily orders.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shop

      public Shop​(SupplierList supplierList, Inventory inventory, OrderRepository orderRepository)
      A constructor for the Shop class, which acts as a container for other major portions of the application's functionality and in-memory data storage.
      Parameters:
      supplierList - Holds a list of all of the tool suppliers.
      inventory - Holds a list of all tools in stock.
      orderRepository - Holds a list of all daily orders for tools.

  • Method Details

    • searchToolByName

      public java.lang.String searchToolByName​(java.lang.String providedToolName)
      Calls the search tool by name method in inventory.
      Parameters:
      providedToolName - The user-inputted tool search parameter.
      Returns:
      String The tool's information.

    • searchToolByID

      public java.lang.String searchToolByID​(java.lang.String providedToolID, java.lang.String inventoryProcess)
      Calls the search tool by ID method in inventory.
      Parameters:
      providedToolID - The user-provided tool ID to search for.
      inventoryProcess - A string that dictates the back-end functionality in the Inventory class. Providing this string allows for substantial code reuse.
      Returns:
      String The relevant tool information returned from the called method.

    • advanceToNextDay

      public void advanceToNextDay()
      Calls the method to advance to the next (simulation) day in the order repository.
